properties.MonoWasmSdkPath: Path to the `sdks` directory in a Mono build. Sets MonoWasmFrameworkPath, MonoWasmTargetsPath, MonoWasmRuntimePath and MonoWasmBindingsPath.
properties.MonoWasmFrameworkPath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly framework assemblies.
properties.MonoWasmRuntimePath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly runtime.
properties.MonoWasmTargetsPath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly build targets.
properties.MonoWasmBindingsPath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly binding assemblies (WebAssembly.Bindings and System.Net.Http.WebAssemblyHttpHandler).
properties.DisableImplicitWasmBindingReferences: Whether to omit references to the WebAssembly binding assemblies (WebAssembly.Bindings and System.Net.Http.WebAssemblyHttpHandler)
